about_the_game:
The Diary is a 2D suspenseful narrative puzzle game that revolves around several distinct "diaries," including a journal full of life but full of doubts, two investigative notebooks written by different people, and the planner's diary, which will all be displayed before you. By solving each page's puzzle, you will turn the pages and gradually gain insight into a heart-stopping missing case. From different perspectives, you will uncover the buried past behind the case.


· Organize scattered chat records and search for clues in the book

· Move the camera to record past images

· Play instruments, catch dolls... and more fun interactions await you to explore!



· Gradually obtain information about the event by reading several diaries

· How will the same event be interpreted from different perspectives?

· Restore the complete picture of the event in a discontinuous time and space



· Organize clues and rearrange the tangled timeline

· Think and analyze to solve the doubts in the book

· Deep reasoning to discover the truth behind the matter



· Open an unknown diary and search for its owner while solving puzzles

· Among 6 characters, whose perspective are you reading the diary from?

· With multiple reversals, the answer may be right in front of you or it may never appear

short_description: Several diaries gradually reveal the thrilling story of a missing case; after multiple deductions, are the answers in the past or present? With frequent plot twists, you never know which is the truth and which is the unexpected; in a dense fog, time buries the past, but the marks remain.
